languages.text: "Тогда вы немного запоздали, Ваша Светлость. Мы истребили всех, кого сумели достать. Один корабль даже рухнул на Кетца Темер, и Лорд-капитан пожелал лично спуститься на планету, чтобы загнать остатки добычи. Так что из ксеносов разве что одиночки остались скитаться по лесам... Однако даже Лорд-капитан не может из них выбраться вот уже тридцать дней. А израненным тварям это тем более не под силу".

traits.locale_text: "Тогда вы немного запоздали, Ваша Светлость. Мы истребили всех, кого сумели достать. Один корабль даже рухнул на Кетца-аль Хет, и Лорд-капитан пожелал лично спуститься на планету, чтобы загнать остатки добычи. Так что из ксеносов разве что одиночки остались скитаться по лесам... Однако даже Лорд-капитан не может из них выбраться вот уже тридцать терранских дней. А израненным тварям это тем более не под силу".

languages.text: "Then you are a bit late, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We have eradicated everyone we could reach. One of the ships even crashed on Quetza Temer, and the Lord Captain did wish to descend and finish off the elusive prey. At best, there are a few solitary xenos left wandering the woods... But even the Lord Captain has not been able to find his way out of them for over thirty days. It will be an even greater ordeal for these wounded creatures."
languages.original_text: "Тогда вы немного запоздали, Ваша Светлость. Мы истребили всех, кого сумели достать. Один корабль даже рухнул на Кетца Темер, и Лорд-капитан пожелал лично спуститься на планету, чтобы загнать остатки добычи. Так что из ксеносов разве что одиночки остались скитаться по лесам... Однако даже Лорд-капитан не может из них выбраться вот уже тридцать дней. А израненным тварям это тем более не под силу".

traits.locale_text: "Then you are a bit late, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We have eradicated everyone we could reach. One of the ships even crashed on Quetza Temer, and the Lord Captain did wish to descend and finish off the elusive prey. At best, there are a few solitary xenos left to wander the woods... But even the Lord Captain has not been able to find his way out of them for over thirty Terran days now. It will be an even greater ordeal for the wounded creatures."

But even the Lord Captain has not been able to find his way out of them for over thirty Terran days now. It will be an even greater ordeal for the wounded creatures."

One of the ships even crashed on Quetza Temer, and the Lord Captain did wish to descend and finish off the elusive prey. At best, there are a few solitary xenos left wandering the woods... But even the Lord Captain has not been able to find his way out of them for over thirty Terran days. It will be an even greater ordeal for these wounded creatures."

"Then you are a bit late, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We have eradicated everyone we could reach. One of the ships even crashed on Quetza Temer, and the Lord Captain did wish to descend and finish off the elusive prey. At best, there are a few solitary xenos left wandering the woods... But even the Lord Captain has not been able to find his way out of them for over thirty days. It will be an even greater ordeal for these wounded creatures."

"Then you are a bit late, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We have eradicated everyone we could reach. One of the ships even crashed on Quetza Temer, and the Lord Captain did wish to descend and finish off the elusive prey. At best, there are a few solitary xenos left wandering the woods... But even the Lord Captain has not been able to find his way out of them for over thirty days. It will be an even greater ordeal for these wounded creatures."

languages.text: « Dans ce cas, j'ai peur que vous arriviez trop tard, Votre Seigneurie. Nous avons éradiqué tous ceux qui ont fait l'erreur de passer à notre portée. Un de leurs vaisseaux s'est écrasé sur Quetza Temer, et le seigneur-capitaine a souhaité descendre à la surface pour mettre à mort ces proies impertinentes. Il devait bien rester quelques survivants xénos isolés, errant dans les bois... Mais cela remonte à trente jours, maintenant. Si même l'illustre Calligos Winterscale ne parvient pas à retrouver son chemin dans cette végétation impénétrable, imaginez ce qu'il en est pour ces créatures blessées. »
languages.original_text: "Then you are a bit late, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We have eradicated everyone we could reach. One of the ships even crashed on Quetza Temer, and the Lord Captain did wish to descend and finish off the elusive prey. At best, there are a few solitary xenos left wandering the woods... But even the Lord Captain has not been able to find his way out of them for over thirty days. It will be an even greater ordeal for these wounded creatures."

traits.locale_text: « Dans ce cas, j'ai peur que vous arriviez trop tard, Votre Seigneurie. Nous avons éradiqué tous ceux qui ont fait l'erreur de passer à notre portée. Un de leurs vaisseaux s'est écrasé sur Quetza Temer, et le seigneur-capitaine a souhaité descendre à la surface pour mettre à mort ces proies impertinentes. Il devait bien rester quelques survivants xénos isolés, errant dans les bois... Mais cela remonte à trente jours, maintenant. Si même l'illustre Calligos Winterscale ne parvient pas à retrouver son chemin dans cette végétation impénétrable, imaginez ce qu'il en est pour ces créatures blessées. »

languages.text: “那您恐怕来晚了一步，大人。我们已经消灭了所有能找到的异形，甚至将他们其中一艘战舰击坠在格扎尔特默。舰长大人确实希望亲自登陆解决掉这些躲躲藏藏的猎物，不过他们最多也就只剩几个零零散散的异形在森林里游荡……就算是对舰长大人而言，他也在那片森林里困了三十多天，找不到出路。对那些受伤的家伙而言，这场磨难只会更加严酷。”
languages.original_text: "Then you are a bit late, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We have eradicated everyone we could reach. One of the ships even crashed on Quetza Temer, and the Lord Captain did wish to descend and finish off the elusive prey. At best, there are a few solitary xenos left wandering the woods... But even the Lord Captain has not been able to find his way out of them for over thirty days. It will be an even greater ordeal for these wounded creatures."

traits.locale_text: “那您恐怕来晚了一步，大人。我们已经消灭了所有能找到的异形，甚至将他们其中一艘战舰击坠在格扎尔特默。舰长大人确实希望亲自登陆解决掉这些躲躲藏藏的猎物，不过他们最多也就只剩几个零零散散的异形在森林里游荡……就算是对舰长大人而言，他也在那片森林里困了三十多天，找不到出路。对那些受伤的家伙而言，这场磨难只会更加严酷。”

languages.text: "Dann seid Ihr wenig zu spät, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Wir haben jeden ausgelöscht, den wir erreichen konnten. Eines der Schiffe ist sogar auf Quetza Temer abgestürzt, und der Lord Captain wollte sogar hinabgehen und die gerissene Beute erledigen. Bestenfalls irren noch ein paar vereinzelte Xenos durch den Wald ... Doch nicht einmal der Lord Captain findet wieder aus den Wäldern heraus, seit über dreißig Tagen nun schon nicht. Für diese verwundeten Kreaturen ist es eine noch größere Pein."
languages.original_text: "Then you are a bit late, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We have eradicated everyone we could reach. One of the ships even crashed on Quetza Temer, and the Lord Captain did wish to descend and finish off the elusive prey. At best, there are a few solitary xenos left wandering the woods... But even the Lord Captain has not been able to find his way out of them for over thirty days. It will be an even greater ordeal for these wounded creatures."

traits.locale_text: "Dann seid Ihr wenig zu spät, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Wir haben jeden ausgelöscht, den wir erreichen konnten. Eines der Schiffe ist sogar auf Quetza Temer abgestürzt, und der Lord Captain wollte sogar hinabgehen und die gerissene Beute erledigen. Bestenfalls irren noch ein paar vereinzelte Xenos durch den Wald ... Doch nicht einmal der Lord Captain findet wieder aus den Wäldern heraus, seit über dreißig terranischen Tagen nun schon nicht. Für diese verwundeten Kreaturen ist es eine noch größere Pein."

"Dann seid Ihr wenig zu spät, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Wir haben jeden ausgelöscht, den wir erreichen konnten. Eines der Schiffe ist sogar auf Quetza Temer abgestürzt, und der Lord Captain wollte sogar hinabgehen und die gerissene Beute erledigen. Bestenfalls irren noch ein paar vereinzelte Xenos durch den Wald ... Doch nicht einmal der Lord Captain findet wieder aus den Wäldern heraus, seit über dreißig terranischen Tagen nun schon nicht. Für diese verwundeten Kreaturen ist es eine noch größere Pein."

languages.text: «Llega un poco tarde, {mf|milord|milady}. Hemos eliminado a todos los que hemos podido. Una de las naves incluso se estrelló en Quetza Temer, y el Lord Capitán quería descender y dar caza a su escurridiza presa. En el mejor de los casos, quedan algunos xenos solitarios deambulando por los bosques... pero ni siquiera el Lord Capitán ha logrado salir de allí en más de treinta días. Para estas criaturas heridas, será un desafío aún mayor».
languages.original_text: "Then you are a bit late, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We have eradicated everyone we could reach. One of the ships even crashed on Quetza Temer, and the Lord Captain did wish to descend and finish off the elusive prey. At best, there are a few solitary xenos left wandering the woods... But even the Lord Captain has not been able to find his way out of them for over thirty days. It will be an even greater ordeal for these wounded creatures."

traits.locale_text: «Llega un poco tarde, {mf|milord|milady}. Hemos eliminado a todos los que hemos podido. Una de las naves incluso se estrelló en Quetza Temer, y el Lord Capitán quería descender y dar caza a su escurridiza presa. En el mejor de los casos, quedan algunos xenos solitarios deambulando por los bosques... pero ni siquiera el Lord Capitán ha logrado salir de allí en más de treinta días. Para estas criaturas heridas, será un desafío aún mayor».

languages.text: 「少し遅かったようですね、陛下。私たちは手の届く限りの敵をすべて殲滅しました。船の一隻はケツァ・テメルに墜落し、ロード・キャプテンはこの捉えどころのない獲物を仕留めるために降下したいと望んでおりました。運が良ければ、森をさまよう孤独な異種族が数体残っているかもしれませんが…しかし、ロード・キャプテンですら、その森から三十日以上も抜け出せずにいるのです。あの負傷した連中にとっては、さらに苛酷な試練となるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Then you are a bit late, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We have eradicated everyone we could reach. One of the ships even crashed on Quetza Temer, and the Lord Captain did wish to descend and finish off the elusive prey. At best, there are a few solitary xenos left wandering the woods... But even the Lord Captain has not been able to find his way out of them for over thirty days. It will be an even greater ordeal for these wounded creatures."

traits.locale_text: 「少し遅かったようですね、陛下。私たちは手の届く限りの敵をすべて殲滅しました。船の一隻はケツァ・テメルに墜落し、ロード・キャプテンはこの捉えどころのない獲物を仕留めるために降下したいと望んでおりました。運が良ければ、森をさまよう孤独な異種族が数体残っているかもしれませんが…しかし、ロード・キャプテンですら、その森から三十日以上も抜け出せずにいるのです。あの負傷した連中にとっては、さらに苛酷な試練となるでしょう」

languages.text: "O vakit biraz geç kaldınız {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Elimizin ulaştığı herkesin kökünü kuruttuk. Hatta gemilerden biri Quetza Temer'e çakıldığında Lord Kaptan, iniş yapıp icaplarına bakmaya niyetlendi. Taş çatlasa üç beş zeno ormanlara kaçmıştır... Lakin Lord Kaptan bile otuz günden beri bu ormanlardan çıkamadı. Mevzubahis yaralı yaratıklar, çok daha zorluk çekiyor olmalı."
languages.original_text: "Then you are a bit late, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We have eradicated everyone we could reach. One of the ships even crashed on Quetza Temer, and the Lord Captain did wish to descend and finish off the elusive prey. At best, there are a few solitary xenos left wandering the woods... But even the Lord Captain has not been able to find his way out of them for over thirty days. It will be an even greater ordeal for these wounded creatures."
